conversations.content: Delete the experimental A/B testing code.

tool_call: vaultManager_deleteFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731634700000_v9w0x1y2z", "workspaceId": "ws_1731634700000_a3b4c5d6e", "sessionDescription": "Removing A/B test code", "sessionMemory": "Experiment concluded after month-long trial with minimal engagement improvements. Test infrastructure removed to reduce codebase complexity and maintenance burden. Previously validated 50 different A/B variants.", "toolContext": "Deleting experimental feature folder because A/B test proved inconclusive and team decided to deprecate to simplify active feature set", "primaryGoal": "Clean up experimental features", "subgoal": "Remove experiment folder"}, "path": "/src/features/experimental/ab-testing"}
Execute a prompt to analyze my code for potential race conditions.

tool_call: agentManager_executePrompt
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731635700000_f9g0h1i2j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731635700000_k3l4m5n6o", "sessionDescription": "Race condition analysis", "sessionMemory": "Debugging concurrency issues found in cache service. Previous code review identified 3 potential synchronization bugs. Need AI analysis to evaluate lock mechanisms and shared state access patterns across queue and map utilities.", "toolContext": "Using Claude Sonnet to analyze concurrency patterns because team code review flagged potential issues and AI can identify subtle race condition patterns across service boundaries", "primaryGoal": "Find and fix concurrency issues", "subgoal": "Analyze code for race conditions"}, "prompt": "Analyze the following code for potential race conditions and concurrency issues. Look for: unprotected shared state, missing locks/mutexes, async operations without proper synchronization, non-atomic operations on shared resources, and time-of-check-time-of-use bugs. Provide specific examples and fixes.", "filepaths": ["/src/services/cache.ts", "/src/services/queue.ts", "/src/utils/concurrent-map.ts"], "model": "claude-sonnet-4", "provider": "anthropic"}
Find all files with FIXME comments.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731636700000_p9q0r1s2t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731636700000_u3v4w5x6y", "sessionDescription": "Finding FIXME comments", "sessionMemory": "Planning cleanup tasks for upcoming sprint. Development team left 47 FIXME markers throughout codebase during rapid feature development. Need to catalog all comments to prioritize technical debt and assign fixes to team members.", "toolContext": "Searching for all FIXME comments so team can inventory technical debt and decide which items to address in upcoming refactoring sprint", "primaryGoal": "Track and resolve technical debt", "subgoal": "Find all FIXME comments"}, "query": "FIXME:|FIXME |", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js", ".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731637900000_b1c2d3e4f", "workspaceId": "ws_1731637900000_g5h6i7j8k", "sessionDescription": "Finding env var usage", "sessionMemory": "Documenting configuration management across services. Currently tracking dependencies between 12 microservices and their environment configurations. Need to identify all places where env variables are referenced for migration to centralized config service.", "toolContext": "Searching for all process.env and import.meta.env references to understand current configuration dependencies before migrating to centralized configuration management", "primaryGoal": "Centralize configuration management", "subgoal": "Find all environment variable references"}, "query": "process\\.env\\.|import\\.meta\\.env\\.", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}
Perform batch updates to add proper null checks.

tool_call: contentManager_batchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731638300000_f5g6h7i8j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731638300000_k9l0m1n2o", "sessionDescription": "Adding null checks", "sessionMemory": "Improving type safety after identifying 23 potential null reference errors in production logs. Array and string utilities identified as highest-risk modules. Adding optional chaining and nullish coalescing to prevent runtime crashes and improve type coverage.", "toolContext": "Performing batch find-and-replace to add null safety guards because analysis showed array/string operations lacking proper null handling, preventing null dereference errors in production", "primaryGoal": "Prevent null reference errors", "subgoal": "Add optional chaining and coalescing"}, "operations": [{"filepath": "/src/utils/array.ts", "operation": "findReplace", "find": "return arr.length", "replace": "return arr?.length ?? 0"}, {"filepath": "/src/utils/string.ts", "operation": "findReplace", "find": "return str.trim()", "replace": "return str?.trim() ?? ''"}]}

Create a new content file for the onboarding documentation.

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731656700000_j7k8l9m1n", "workspaceId": "ws_1731656700000_o2p3q4r5s", "sessionDescription": "Creating onboarding docs", "sessionMemory": "Documentation initiative following team expansion. Hired 4 new developers joining next week. Current setup guide is 2 years old and missing Docker/Node 18 requirements. Need updated guide covering prerequisites, installation, and local development verification.", "toolContext": "Creating developer setup guide to help new team members quickly configure local environment because current documentation is outdated and onboarding typically takes 2 days to troubleshoot environment issues", "primaryGoal": "Improve developer onboarding", "subgoal": "Create setup documentation"}, "filePath": "/docs/onboarding/developer-setup.md", "content": "# Developer Setup Guide

## Prerequisites
- Node.js 18+
- Docker Desktop
- Git

## Installation
1. Clone repository
2. Run `npm install`
3. Copy `.env.example` to `.env`
4. Run `docker-compose up -d`
5. Run `npm run dev`

## Verification
Navigate to http://localhost:3000"}
Create a folder for the new authentication service implementation.

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731657200000_x3y4z5a6b", "workspaceId": "ws_1731657200000_c7d8e9f1g", "sessionDescription": "Setting up auth service structure", "sessionMemory": "Auth system rewrite due to security requirements. Current auth service handles 500K daily login requests. New v2 will implement OAuth2, SAML support, and WebAuthn. Folder structure will separate concerns: core logic, providers, middleware, and tests.", "toolContext": "Creating new service folder to establish proper directory structure for OAuth2/SAML implementation because separation enables multiple developers to work in parallel without merge conflicts", "primaryGoal": "Implement authentication system v2", "subgoal": "Create service folder structure"}, "path": "/services/auth-service-v2"}
Find all React hooks that might have missing dependencies.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731657800000_a2b3c4d5e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731657800000_f6g7h8i9j", "sessionDescription": "Finding hook dependency issues", "sessionMemory": "React code quality audit. Frontend team reported occasional infinite loops and stale closures in components. ESLint plugin disabled in 6 files due to errors. Need to review 89 useEffect and 34 useCallback hooks for missing or incorrect dependencies.", "toolContext": "Searching for all hooks to identify missing dependencies because stale closures and infinite loops are likely caused by incomplete dependency arrays in useEffect and useCallback", "primaryGoal": "Fix hook dependency issues", "subgoal": "Find hooks with missing dependencies"}, "query": "useEffect\\(|useCallback\\(|useMemo\\(", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}
Search for all hardcoded URLs that should be environment variables.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731659300000_l4m5n6o7p", "workspaceId": "ws_1731659300000_q8r9s1t2u", "sessionDescription": "Finding hardcoded URLs", "sessionMemory": "Configuration refactor in progress. Production API endpoints hardcoded in 14 files pointing to different servers per environment. QA team confused about which URL is active. Need to externalize all API URLs to environment configuration for easy management across dev/staging/production.", "toolContext": "Searching for hardcoded URLs to externalize them to environment variables because deployment teams need to update endpoints without code changes and QA/prod need different URLs from development", "primaryGoal": "Externalize configuration", "subgoal": "Find and move hardcoded URLs"}, "query": "https?://[a-zA-Z0-9.-]+\\.(com|net|org|io)|localhost:[0-9]+", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".tsx", ".js", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

Search for all magic numbers that should be constants.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731662900000_f3g4h5i6j", "workspaceId": "ws_1731662900000_k7l8m9n1o", "sessionDescription": "Finding magic numbers", "sessionMemory": "Code quality improvement sprint. Code review found inconsistent magic numbers: timeout values hardcoded as 5000 in some places and 3000 in others. Found 34 hardcoded page sizes, 12 retry counts, and 28 other numeric constants scattered throughout application code.", "toolContext": "Searching for magic numbers to extract as named constants because hardcoded values make it unclear what numbers mean and makes updates error-prone when value must change across multiple files", "primaryGoal": "Extract constants", "subgoal": "Find magic numbers"}, "query": "[^0-9][0-9]{2,}(?![0-9])|\\s+[0-9]{2,}\\s*[;,)]", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Search for all environment configurations that reference production URLs.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731664100000_r3s4t5u6v", "workspaceId": "ws_1731664100000_w7x8y9z1a", "sessionDescription": "Finding prod URL references", "sessionMemory": "Environment audit before infrastructure audit. Discovered 8 configuration files with production URLs hardcoded. QA environment accidentally pointed to prod APIs. Security concern: staging and dev could access production data if deployed incorrectly.", "toolContext": "Searching for production URL references in config files to identify and isolate them because discovery showed environments pointing to wrong APIs and security team needs to audit for data exposure risks", "primaryGoal": "Audit environment configurations", "subgoal": "Find production URLs"}, "query": "api\\.production\\.|prod\\.example\\.com|production.*url", "folder": "/config", "fileTypes": [".json", ".yaml", ".yml", ".env"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Search for all password or secret variables stored in plain text.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731665200000_t4u5v6w7x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731665200000_y8z9a1b2c", "sessionDescription": "Finding plaintext secrets", "sessionMemory": "Security hardening. Security incident report recommended comprehensive audit and secret management system implementation.", "toolContext": "Searching for hardcoded secrets to identify exposure risks because discovery of plaintext passwords in config files and git history creates security vulnerability and requires immediate remediation", "primaryGoal": "Secure credentials", "subgoal": "Find plaintext secrets"}, "query": "password\\s*=\\s*['\"]|secret\\s*=\\s*['\"]|api[_-]?key\\s*=\\s*['\"]", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js", ".env"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731669000000_h1i2j3k4l", "workspaceId": "ws_1731669000000_m5n6o7p8q", "sessionDescription": "Finding slow queries", "sessionMemory": "Database optimization. Find all functions exceeding 50 lines that should be refactored.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731680000000_u2v3w4x5y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731680000000_z6a7b8c9d", "sessionDescription": "Finding long functions", "sessionMemory": "Code quality improvement. Code review guidelines specify max 50 lines per function. Audit found 28 functions exceeding limit. Three particularly large functions: authService (340 lines), userController (280 lines), and dataProcessor (250 lines) are high-risk candidates for refactoring.", "toolContext": "Searching for large functions to identify refactoring opportunities because functions >50 lines are harder to test, understand, and maintain and breaking them into smaller pieces improves code quality", "primaryGoal": "Refactor long functions", "subgoal": "Find oversized functions"}, "query": "function\\s+\\w+\\(|const\\s+\\w+\\s*=.*\\(.*\\).*=>", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

Search for all uses of deprecated React patterns.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731686500000_k5l6m7n8o", "workspaceId": "ws_1731686500000_p9q1r2s3t", "sessionDescription": "Finding deprecated patterns", "sessionMemory": "React modernization initiative. Codebase still uses createClass, PropTypes, and string refs from React pre-Hooks era. Need to migrate to functional components with hooks. Found: 12 React.createClass, 45 PropTypes usages, 23 string refs, 8 findDOMNode calls.", "toolContext": "Searching for deprecated React patterns to plan modernization because createClass, PropTypes, and string refs are outdated and using modern hooks enables better optimization and code splitting", "primaryGoal": "Modernize React code", "subgoal": "Find deprecated patterns"}, "query": "React\\.createClass|PropTypes\\.func\\.isRequired|findDOMNode|string\\s+ref=", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx", ".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Find all uses of deprecated utility functions.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731687800000_g4h5i6j7k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731687800000_l8m9n1o2p", "sessionDescription": "Finding deprecated utils", "sessionMemory": "Code modernization. Legacy project imported lodash, underscore, and moment.js at large scale. Modern JavaScript reduces need for these libraries with built-in methods. Audit found: 89 lodash imports, 12 underscore requires, 34 moment instances used across 42 files.", "toolContext": "Searching for lodash, underscore, and moment imports to plan removal because modern JavaScript and Date API provide equivalent functionality and removing dependencies reduces bundle size and maintenance burden", "primaryGoal": "Remove deprecated code", "subgoal": "Find deprecated libraries"}, "query": "import.*from.*'lodash'|require\\('underscore'\\)|moment\\(\\)", "folder": "/src", "fileTypes": [".ts", ".js"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}
Search for all React components without error boundaries.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731689100000_h7i8j9k1l", "workspaceId": "ws_1731689100000_m2n3o4p5q", "sessionDescription": "Finding missing error boundaries", "sessionMemory": "Error handling improvement. Production monitoring shows 8% of page views have uncaught React errors from child components. Only 4 pages currently have error boundaries. 32 page components need error boundaries to gracefully degrade instead of crashing entire app.", "toolContext": "Searching for page components without error boundaries to identify where to add protection because uncaught errors in child components crash entire page and error boundaries gracefully handle failures", "primaryGoal": "Add error boundaries", "subgoal": "Find unprotected components"}, "query": "export.*function.*(?!.*ErrorBoundary)|class.*extends.*Component(?!.*ErrorBoundary)", "folder": "/src/pages", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": false, "wholeWord": false}

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731689600000_q8r9s1t2u", "workspaceId": "ws_1731689600000_v3w4x5y6z", "sessionDescription": "Finding hardcoded text", "sessionMemory": "i18n implementation for global expansion. Found 180 hardcoded text strings in components that should be externalized to translation files.", "toolContext": "Searching for hardcoded text strings because global expansion requires supporting multiple languages and hardcoded text prevents translation while externalized strings enable easy i18n implementation", "primaryGoal": "Internationalize app", "subgoal": "Find hardcoded strings"}, "query": ">\\s*[A-Z][a-zA-Z\\s]+</|title=['\"][A-Z][a-zA-Z\\s]+['\"]|placeholder=['\"][A-Z]", "folder": "/src/components", "fileTypes": [".tsx", ".jsx"], "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731694000000_c9d1e2f3g", "workspaceId": "ws_1731694000000_h4i5j6k7l", "sessionDescription": "Finding null check issues", "sessionMemory": "Type safety improvement initiative.
